name: Video x Music Stream Bot
description: Telegram bot for Streaming Video & Music trought the Telegram Group Video Chat, powered by pytgcalls and pyrogram

BOT_NAME.description: fill with your bot name from @BotFather

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: fill with the assistant username account without @

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram String Session

SUDO_USERS.description: list of user ids to be added to sudo member list, or just fill with your id

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: if you have channel, then fill the channel username here without @

OWNER_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

ALIVE_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account nickname/name

AUTH_USERS.description: fill with your telegram account id

LOG_CHANNEL.description: fill with your telegram log channel id

DB_NAME.description: fill with your mongodb.com database name

DB_URL.description: fill with your mongodb.com database url
